title: WHO WANTS OCE RP CARD
body:
i got an oce rp card can anyone exchange with me with an na one?
please~~{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Trading is pretty risky, and we couldn't offer support in cases of a scam.  You should hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead.  Our billing team can look into your case specifically and see if we might be able to make an exchange.  We'll get back to you!

To clarify, RP cards are specific to their own region.  If you have an NA card for example, you can't use it on OCE.  However, we know that this can happen sometimes and our billing team can look into each unique case individually to see if there's anything we can do.  I can't make any guarantees, but it doesn't hurt to reach out.
